metadata.title: CVE-2021-28053 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Centreon-Web in Centreon Platform 20.10.0. A SQLinjection vulnerability in "Configuration > Users > Contacts / Users"allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via theAdditional Information parameters.

criterions.comment: centreon-engine package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
